reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Heart of Gold is a great hostel. As long as you know you are booking budget accomodation then you should not be disappointed. I can't comment on the dorm rooms as we had booked an ensuite twin room. The only negative about the whole experience was finding out that ensuite rooms have a private shower and sink, but no toilet! That was quite annoying and should be made clear on the website.
reviews.title: Great value at the Heart of Gold

likes.disliked: — No private toilet in ensuite rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2003, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, other than that I cannot fault it. The location is excellent - very easy to reach on public transport, close to major attractions (the Reichstag is a 20 minute walk), and in a great area for eating out in the evening. The hostel is just behind Oranienburger Strasse which is lined with restaurants and bars, so you will be spoilt for choice. We ate in a small Thai restaurant just round the corner from the hostel and it was some of the best Thai I have ever eaten!
reviews.title: Great Hostel
Heart of Gold - a good place
reviews.text: Back to the hostel. Accommodation is basic, but it's perfectly adequate. Beds and pillows were fine, although the bedlinen smelt slightly musty. There is a great bar area in the hostel that is open 24 hours for the insomniacs amongst us. The staff are really friendly and helpful, loaning us padlocks for the lockers and helping us make a reservation at a particular restaurant we wanted to eat at. There are loads of flyers and leaflets advertising sightseeing trips and the staff are also happy to advise. We went on a bicycle tour of Berlin run by Fat Tyre which was awesome - definitely recommended as a good way of seeing the main sights. Our guide was excellent and very knowledgeable about Berlin's history.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Go to Berlin - it's a fantastic city. I can't wait to go back. And if I am on a budget I would not hesitate in staying at the Heart of Gold again.
reviews.title: Great with one exception

likes.disliked: — not really friendly staff (maybe it was beacause of the morning shift...)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When my husband I went backpacking through Europe, the Heart of Gold Hostel was one of our favorites. The breakfast was good in the morning, and the bar was nice at night. The room was clean, and paying extra for a private shower was worth it. Only minus was our laundry took forever to dry. This place is worth staying at.
reviews.title: Great time at Heart of Gold

reviews.text: I and two friends stayed at the Heart Of Gold hostel on our independent trip to Berlin and Paris this year.
